alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 2:15AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa...South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Minnehaha, Lyon and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Brookings and Hamlin Counties. ...Observed flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Big Sioux River near Estelline. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1644.0 feet, significant flooding of crop and pasture land begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 1644.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 AM CDT Tuesday was 1644.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1644.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Big Sioux River Estelline 1644.0 1644.2 Tue 3 am MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by late Tuesday morning.
